targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route=~"$route", http_request_method=~"$method", http_response_status_code=~"4..|5.."}[5m]) or vector(0)) / sum(rate(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route=~"$route", http_request_method=~"$method"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route=~"$route", http_request_method=~"$method", http_response_status_code=~"4.."}[5m]) or vector(0)) / sum(rate(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route=~"$route", http_request_method=~"$method"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route=~"$route", http_request_method=~"$method", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[5m]) or vector(0)) / sum(rate(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route=~"$route", http_request_method=~"$method"}[5m]))

topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route!=""}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))

topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_count{exported_job="$job", k8s_pod_ip="$instance", http_route!="", error_type!=""}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))

panels.title: Количество ошибок при обработке событий c kafka
